Career Profile

I work as a Junior Software Engineer at Accso Accelerated Solutions GmbH in Darmstadt. My research areas are Industry 4.0, Augmented Reality and Machine Learning. Currently, I am working on predictive maintenance in the context of industry 4.0 driven manufacturing processes. Furthermore, I am always open to new projects in these fields. Do not hesitate to contact me.
